caseTitle: Federation of Pakistan through Secretary Ministry of National Health Services, Regulations & Coordination (Population Programe Wing), Govt of Pakistan, Islamabad v. Jehanzeb and others
tagline: (1) Discussion on proforma promotion, embedded in Fundamental Rule 17. (2) Delay in the proforma promotion triggers hardship and creates multiplicity of litigation. (3) In the erstwhile move-over policy, the move-over was not promotion to the higher Basic Pay Scale, but the higher pay scale was treated as an extension of the existing Pay Scale. (SI.No.73 to SI.No.91).
